member.name: T:PFRandomData.RandomValues
member.summary: Basic prototype for a ProFast application or library class.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomValues.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomValues.GetDefaultNationalId(PFRandomData.RandomValues.enNationalIdCountry)
member.summary: Routine for generating the default national id of all zeros.
member.returns: Always returns string containing an all zeros national id.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomValues.GetNationalId(PFRandomData.RandomValues.enNationalIdCountry)
member.summary: Routine to generate a random (non-valid) national id.
member.param: Country for which the random id will be formatted.
member.returns: String containing the random national id.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomValues.GetNationalIdUS
member.summary: Routine to generate a random (non-valid) SSN.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomValues.GetNationalIdCAN
member.summary: Routine to generate a random (non-valid) national id.
member.returns: String containing the random national id.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomValues.GetNationalIdMEX
member.summary: Routine to generate a random (non-valid) national id.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomValues.GetTelephoneNumber
member.summary: Routine to generate a random and invalid telephone number.
member.remarks: Country code of 1 and area code of 000 will be specified in the resulting random telephone number.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomValues.GetTelephoneNumber(System.String)
member.summary: Routine to generate a random and invalid telephone number.
member.param: Specify the area code for the telephone number.
member.remarks: Country code of 1 will be specified in the resulting random telephone number.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomValues.GetTelephoneNumber(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Routine to generate a random and invalid telephone number.
member.param: Specify the country code for the telephone number.
Specify the area code for the telephone number.
member.remarks: Leave countryCode and/or areaCode blank to omit those portions of the telephone number from the random result.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomValues.GetEmailAddress
member.summary: Routine to generate a random email address.
member.remarks: All email addresses are for the example domain.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomValues.GetEmailAddress(System.String)
member.summary: Routine to generate a random email address.
member.param: Top level domain to use for this address (e.g. com, net, org, edu).
member.remarks: All email addresses are for the example domain.

member.name: T:PFRandomData.RandomNumber
member.summary: Generates random numeric values for various .NET numeric types.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomNumber.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor for the class. Does nothing.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomNumber.GenerateRandomInt(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates an int32 number in the specified range.
member.param: Output will be equal to or greater than this number.
Output will be less than this number.
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer greater than or equal to min and less than or equal to max
member.remarks: Uses Next method of the .NET Framework Random class.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomNumber.GenerateRandomNumber(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates random integer with a value within min to max range.
member.remarks: Method first generates a random double which it converts to an integer value.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomNumber.GenerateRandomNumber(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Generates random double.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomNumber.GenerateRandomNumber(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Generates random float.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomNumber.GenerateRandomNumber(System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Generates random unsigned integer.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomNumber.GenerateRandomNumber(System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Generates random long integer.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomNumber.GenerateRandomNumber(System.UInt64,System.UInt64)
member.summary: Generates random unsigned long integer.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomNumber.GenerateRandomNumber(System.Int16,System.Int16)
member.summary: Generates random short integer.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomNumber.GenerateRandomNumber(System.UInt16,System.UInt16)
member.summary: Generates random unsigned short integer.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomNumber.GenerateRandomNumber(System.Decimal,System.Decimal)
member.summary: Generates random decimal number.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomNumber.GenerateRandomNumber(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Generates random byte.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomNumber.GenerateRandomNumber(System.SByte,System.SByte)
member.summary: Generates random signed byte.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomNumber.GenerateRandomInt(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Method generates an array of random int values.
member.param: Number of random numbers to generate.
member.returns: An array of 32-bit signed integers, each greater than or equal to min and less than or equal to max.
member.remarks: Uses Next method of the .NET Framework Random class.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomNumber.GenerateRandomNumber(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Method generates an array of random integer values.
member.param: Number of random numbers to generate.
member.remarks: Method first generates a random double which it converts to an integer value.

member.summary: Method generates an array of random long integer values.
member.param: Number of random numbers to generate.

member.summary: Method generates an array of random unsigned long integer values.
member.param: Number of random numbers to generate.

member.name: T:PFRandomData.RandomBytes
member.summary: Class for generating byte arrays containing random characters.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomBytes.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor for the class. Does nothing.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomBytes.GenerateRandomBytes(System.Int32)
member.summary: Method for generating a byte array containing random values.
member.param: Number of random bytes to produce.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomBytes.GenerateRandomChars(System.Int32)
member.summary: Method for generating a char array containing random values.
member.param: Number of char values to produce.

member.name: T:PFRandomData.RandomString
member.summary: Class has methods to generate random strings.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomString.GetString(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates random string using characters between ascii 32 and 127 (\ excluded).
member.param: Number of characters in random string.
member.remarks: Backslash is excluded to make sure the resulting string can be stored correctly in a string variable.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomString.GetStringAN(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates alpha numeric random string (a-z, A-Z, 0-9)
member.param: Number of characters in random string.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomString.GetStringANUC(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates alpha numeric random string (A-Z, 0-9)
member.param: Number of characters in random string.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomString.GetStringANLC(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates alpha numeric random string (a-z, 0-9)
member.param: Number of characters in random string.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomString.GetStringANX(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates alpha numeric random string (a-z, A-Z, 0-9) or random punctuation marks from among the following: ! @ # $ % ^ & * ( ) _ + : ? ; > <
member.param: Number of characters in random string

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomString.GetStringAL(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates upper and lower case letters random string (a-z, A-Z).
member.param: Number of characters in random string

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomString.GetStringLC(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates alpha random string of lower case letters (a-z).
member.param: Number of characters in random string

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomString.GetStringUC(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates alpha random string of Upper case letters (A-Z).
member.param: Number of characters in random string

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomString.GetStringDEC(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates alpha random string of numeric characters (0-9).
member.param: Number of characters in random string

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomString.GetStringHEX(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates alpha random string of hexadecimal numeric characters (0-9, A-F).
member.param: Number of characters in random string

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomString.GetStringIncludingBackslashAndDoubleQuotes(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a random string that can include backslash (\) and double-quote characters ("). Ascii characters between decimal 32 and 127 can be included in the return string.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomString.GetStringNoSpaces(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves string of random ascii characters from decimal 33 to 127. Space, backslash and double-quote characters are excluded from inclusion in random string output.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomString.GetRandomSyllablesLC(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates random syllables in lower case.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomString.GetRandomSyllablesUC(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates random syllables in upper case.

member.name: M:PFRandomData.RandomString.GetRandomSyllablesUCLC(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates random syllables with first letter of first syllable in upper case and all othrs in lower case.

member.name: T:PFRandomData.RandomSingleCharacterRepeated
member.summary: Class for producing repeated random characters. (For example, a line consisting of nothing but the letter A repeated x number of times.
